title: Can Not Open LOL
body: When I downloaded League of Legends, it worked on my neighbor's computer but when I used mine, it says "Failed to launch RADS\system\rads_user_kernel.exe" Please help!!!

replies.body:
RADS errors almost always indicate some type of OS Permissions Issue.  You are telling your computer to run the program, but the Operating System is denying it for some reason.  To get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). They may seem fairly simple and basic, but they should resolve your issue!

Let me know if it doesn't help!
